item.title: By: Travis
item.dc:creator: Travis
item.description: <p>Matt,<br/><br /><br/><br />I'm glad you like your new iPhone. I too am one of the lucky ones and I love mine. I hope I like it even more than the original.<br/><br /><br/><br />I also picked up the invisibleSHIELD (it is the only protective film carried by CPW). I got the original invisibleSHIELD on my first iPhone and have it on my iPod as well. I get it for all my gadgets. I've learned from painful experience that I need something to keep my toys looking new.<br/><br /><br/><br />Apple has another huge hit with the new iPhone, I think they're taking over the world! :) I can't wait for the new iPods to come out in September.<br/><br /><br/><br />Cheers</p>
item.content:encoded:
Matt,

I’m glad you like your new iPhone. I too am one of the lucky ones and I love mine. I hope I like it even more than the original.

I also picked up the invisibleSHIELD (it is the only protective film carried by CPW). I got the original invisibleSHIELD on my first iPhone and have it on my iPod as well. I get it for all my gadgets. I’ve learned from painful experience that I need something to keep my toys looking new.

Apple has another huge hit with the new iPhone, I think they’re taking over the world! ðŸ™‚ I can’t wait for the new iPods to come out in September.

Cheers
